The important/ serious contractual issues pUt Up to EC are mostly related to Extension of Time, Change of Scope, Provisional Completion/ Completion, Change in Ownership, interpretation of the RFP /RFQ clauses, contract related policy decisions etc. It has been decided that to keep uniformity in the decisions of the   Authority and maintaining a central repository of contractual  decisions, all the contractual issues be routed through contract management Cell (CMC) of NHAI. The CMC will  critically examine on various contractual issues and circulars and put up their advice. 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
